CustomField.description: Description of the sales process, displayed to the user when clicking through to a new opportunity that doesn\'t automatically get placed into a sales process and requires the user to select which process to use.\n\nWhen is this sales process applied, etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a description for the Sales Process Playbook that conveys sufficient information when you are subsequently viewing or editing the process.
CustomField.label: Description
